title: Melty Honey
sinopse:
"I will make him my slave!" Makoto Hinohara planned to seduce the shabby looking teacher, Aiba. Contrarily, to his surprise, he was aroused by his teacher; the touch of his fingers and the tip of his tongue. The tender looking teacher had turned out to be such a devilish person! So now what will Makoto Hinohara do? There's also a little extra story at the end, too!

by fushichou
